text: The 1939–40 Idaho Vandals men's basketball team represented the University of Idaho during the 1939–40 NCAA college basketball season. Members of the Pacific Coast Conference, the Vandals were led by fourth-year head coach Forrest Twogood and played their home games on campus at Memorial Gymnasium in Moscow, Idaho.
